segments.text: There isn't much rice , is there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there isn't , but there are some vegetables .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very hungry , Donald . What can I eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a little bread and there are a few biscuits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I want some rice and some meat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , I'll walk to the village and I'll get some meat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . By the way , who's going to cook the meat ?
segments.speaker: S1
